dublin_core.dcvalue: Human resources information system allowing patients to verify via SMS if a clinic or healthcare provider is licensed and in good standing
Vincent Oketcho, Chief of Party, IntraHealth International | Tel: +256312-299-641; Email: oketcho@intrahealth.org

Human resource management, Provider training and education, Data collection and reporting, Child health, Family planning, HIV/AIDS, Infectious diseases, Malaria and other vector-borne diseases, Maternal health, Newborn health, Non-communicable diseases, Nutrition, Parasitic diseases, Primary Care, Sexual and reproductive health, Tuberculosis, Violence, Water, sanitation, and hygiene
